summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2967, for the improvement of 22nd Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to existing concrete sidewalk on East 54th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with the necessary wooden cross walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 35768 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
